However, to our knowledge, neither the data inputs nor the methods for estimating proportions mature at length (PML) or at age (PMA) have been revised exhaustively for this stock. In this report, we present an update of the scientific surveys available to this end, and of the equations used for calculations by sex and year over the 1983-2023 period. The revised values for PML and PMA were relatively coherent between surveys, despite key differences in the type of sampling (random-stratified or systematic) and the season (winter, spring or summer). It is therefore established that, provided that sufficient sample sizes are available, the survey conducted in the month of August could well replace that on cod reproductive potential in the spring as the main data source for the estimation of PML and PMA in the coming years. We conclude that the maturity indices for this stock are quite robust to the season and sampling type, but that the degree of coherence between the various surveys may largely depend on the quantity and quality of sampling."}],"ind1":"3","ind2":" "}},{"520":{"subfields":[{"a":"L’état de maturité du stock de morue franche (Gadus morhua) du nord du Golfe du Saint-Laurent est évalué par le Ministère Pêches et Océans Canada (MPO) depuis plus de 40 ans. Toutefois, à notre connaissance, ni les intrants ni les méthodes de calcul des proportions matures à la longueur (PML) ou à l’âge (PMA) n’ont fait l’objet d’une révision exhaustive chez ce stock. Dans ce rapport, nous présentons une mise à jour des relevés disponibles et des équations du calcul pour les morues de chaque sexe et année au cours de la période 1983-2023. Les valeurs révisées de PML et de PMA étaient relativement comparables entre les relevés, et ce, malgré des différences marquées dans le type de plan d’échantillonnage (aléatoire stratifié ou systématique) et la saison (hiver, printemps ou été). Il est donc établi que, pour des tailles d’échantillon suffisantes, le relevé du mois d’août pourrait probablement remplacer celui du potentiel reproducteur de morue au printemps dans les années à venir. Nous concluons que les indices de maturité chez ce stock sont relativement robustes à la saison et au type d’échantillonnage, mais que le niveau d’accord entre les différentes mesures dépend largement de la quantité et de la qualité de l’échantillonnage effectué."}],"ind1":"3","ind2":"9"}},{"524":{"subfields":[{"a":"Beaudry-Sylvestre, M., Ouellette-Plante, J., Benoît, H. 2025. Update of the inputs and estimation method for the maturity ogives of Atlantic Cod in the Northern Gulf of St. Lawrence (3Pn, 4RS) over the 1983-2023 period. Can. Tech. Rep. Fish. Aquat. Sci. 3671: viii + 32 p. https://doi.org/10.60825/z5m6-hx38  "}],"ind1":"8","ind2":" "}},{"264":{"subfields":[{"a":"Mont-Joli, QC :"},{"b":"Regional Sciences Branch, Quebec Region, Demersal and Benthic Sciences Division, Fisheries and Oceans Canada, Maurice Lamontagne Institute,"},{"c":"2025."}],"ind1":" ","ind2":"1"}},{"264":{"subfields":[{"c":"©2025"}],"ind1":" ","ind2":"4"}},{"300":{"subfields":[{"a":"1 online resource (viii, 32 pages) :"},{"b":"maps, charts"}],"ind1":" ","ind2":" "}},{"490":{"subfields":[{"a":"Canadian technical report of fisheries and aquatic sciences,"},{"x":"1488-5379 ;"},{"v":"3671"}],"ind1":"1","ind2":" "}},{"830":{"subfields":[{"a":"Canadian technical report of fisheries and aquatic sciences ;"},{"v":"3671."},{"x":"1488-5379"}],"ind1":" ","ind2":"0"}},{"245":{"subfields":[{"a":"Update of the inputs and estimation method for the maturity ogives of Atlantic Cod in the Northern Gulf of St. Lawrence (3Pn, 4RS) over the 1983-2023 period /"},{"c":"Manuelle Beaudry-Sylvestre, Jordan Ouellette-Plante, and Hugues Benoît."}],"ind1":"1","ind2":"0"}},{"775":{"subfields":[{"i":"French version :"},{"t":"Mise à jour des intrants et des méthodes de calcul de l'ogive de maturité de la morue franche du nord du golfe du Saint-Laurent (3Pn, 4RS) sur la période 1983-2023 "}],"ind1":"0","ind2":" "}},{"006":"m     o  d f      "},{"007":"cr cn ---aunu "},{"008":"250513s2025    qucbd   o    f000 0 eng dnam i "},{"040":{"subfields":[{"a":"CaNSDB"},{"b":"eng"},{"e":"rda"}],"ind1":" ","ind2":" "}},{"041":{"subfields":[{"a":"eng"},{"b":"fre"}],"ind1":"0","ind2":" "}},{"336":{"subfields":[{"a":"text"},{"b":"txt"},{"2":"rdacontent"}],"ind1":" ","ind2":" "}},{"337":{"subfields":[{"a":"computer"},{"b":"c"},{"2":"rdamedia"}],"ind1":" ","ind2":" "}},{"338":{"subfields":[{"a":"online resource"},{"b":"cr"},{"2":"rdacarrier"}],"ind1":" ","ind2":" "}},{"995":{"subfields":[{"a":"DFO"}],"ind1":" ","ind2":" "}}]}}
